cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in W Residences Dubai Harbour. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Exclusive waterfront residences at Dubai Harbour
project_info_text:
W Residences Dubai Harbour by ARADA is a premium waterfront development set in one of the city’s most dynamic coastal districts. Designed for those who value contemporary architecture and uninterrupted sea views, the project combines refined interiors with bold design and a vibrant lifestyle concept.

The development offers a curated collection of 1 to 5-bedroom residences, including duplexes and penthouses. Spacious layouts, floor-to-ceiling glazing, and elevated finishes define each home, while resort-style amenities and direct access to Dubai Harbour’s marina lifestyle create an address that blends glamour, privacy, and connectivity.
amenities_title: Infrastructure and landscaping of the residential complex
project_summary_subtitle: Luxury residences with panoramic sea views
map_text: Located in Dubai Harbour, the project offers seamless access to Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island. Residents enjoy proximity to waterfront promenades, fine dining venues, and key business districts while remaining immersed in a serene marine setting.
footer_tagline: Exclusive waterfront living at Dubai Harbour
